kw.name: Download Apk
kw.doc: download file from ftp server param ftp_file_path: ftp download file path param dst_file_path: local path return:
kw.msg: 10.12.32.163 ftpuser tvu123admin *resp* '220 (vsFTPd 3.0.3)' *cmd* u'USER ftpuser' *resp* '331 Please specify the password.' *cmd* u'PASS ***********' *resp* '230 Login successful.' *welcome* '220 (vsFTPd 3.0.3)' 220 (vsFTPd 3.0.3) *cmd* 'TYPE A' *resp* '200 Switching to ASCII mode.' *cmd* 'PASV' *resp* '227 Entering Passive Mode (10,12,32,163,39,32).' *cmd* u'NLST /AnywhereShare/android_release/anywhere/' *resp* '150 Here comes the directory listing.' *resp* '226 Directory send OK.' /AnywhereShare/android_release/anywhere/TVUAnywhere_V8.0.9.290_2001101334_release.apk file_name is already exist. *cmd* 'QUIT' *resp* '221 Goodbye.'
